Description:
Our client is a management consulting firm founded in 2018. It is based out of Downtown Dubai, UAE. Their team possesses over 20+ years of experience serving different industries offering solutions in consulting and compliance space. They are constantly evolving our solutions to fit into reality of changes in the compliance landscape and business realities.We are looking for an experienced Business Development Executive for our client to help them grow their business. The candidate should have a 6-10 year sales and commercial background in the accounting, audit, AML and tax industryJob Requirements:Will promote the company through various channels, including networking, attending seminars, meetings, webinars, calls, emails, etc.
Manage the CRM and ensure it is utilized to its full potential.
Devise the marketing strategy and improve upon it when required.
Work with the Digital Marketing team to optimize the efforts of the digital marketing team and the CRM.
Meeting with new and prospective clients, providing quotes, following up with clients, and converting
Be able to handle dynamic environment, which may or may not be structured and
Use sound judgment in dealing with situations.
Be able to juggle several deliverables in a high-pressure environment.
Be open to learning the products and services of the business so that he or she canJob Type: Full-timeSalary: AED7,000.00 - AED10,000.00 per monthJob Details
